scenario.name: Basic Sipstone UAC
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len] X-DolbyVoice-Client-LogId: with-dtmfformat.xml X-DolbyVoice-MediaServer-MultiCodec: 0
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 123 110 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 a=rtpmap:9 G722/8000 a=rtpmap:97 DVC-2/8000 a=rtpmap:116 G7221/32000 a=fmtp:116 bitrate=48000 a=rtpmap:117 G7221/16000 a=fmtp:117 bitrate=32000 a=rtpmap:120 opus/48000/2 a=fmtp:120 useinbandfec=1;usedtx=1;sprop-stereo=1 a=rtpmap:121 AMR-WB/16000/1 a=fmtp:121 octet-align=1;mode-change-period=1;mode-change-capability=2;mode-change-neighbor=0;max-red=-1;crc=0;robust-sorting=0 a=rtpmap:122 AMR-WB/16000/1 a=fmtp:122 octet-align=1;mode-change-period=1;mode-change-capability=2;mode-change-neighbor=0;max-red=80000;crc=0;robust-sorting=1 a=rtpmap:123 AMR-WB/16000/1 a:fmtp:123 octet-align=0;mode-change-period=1;mode-change-capability=2;mode-change-neighbor=0;max-red=-100;crc=0;robust-sorting=0 a=rtpmap:99 L16/32000/1 a=rtpmap:110 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:110 0-16 a=rtpmap:111 telephone-event/16000 a=fmtp:111 0-16 a=rtpmap:112 telephone-event/32000 a=fmtp:112 0-16

ACK sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0

BYE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 BYE Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0
